participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: A bit melancholic and reflective, often expressing feelings of frustration.
participant_1.background: Alex comes from a suburban area and has been feeling overwhelmed with school and family expectations.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and hardworking, she is dedicated to helping her family and enjoys the simplicity of farm life.
participant_2.background: Jordan grew up on a family farm and has a strong connection to nature and her family's traditions.
